mapper.insert: insert into company(cid,cpasswd,cname, cemail, cno1, cno2, cno3, cmaster, ccategory, post1,post2,addr1,addr2,cphone1,cphone2,cphone3) values( #{cid},#{cpasswd},#{cname},#{cemail}, #{cno1},#{cno2},#{cno3},#{cmaster}, #{ccategory},#{post1}, #{post2}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{cphone1}, #{cphone2}, #{cphone3})
mapper.select: select cid,cpasswd,cname, cemail, cno1, cno2, cno3, cmaster, ccategory, post1,post2,addr1,addr2,cphone1,cphone2,cphone3 from company where cid = #{cid} and cpasswd=#{cpasswd}
select cid,cpasswd,cname, cemail, cno1, cno2, cno3, cmaster, ccategory, post1,post2,addr1,addr2,cphone1,cphone2,cphone3 from company where cid = #{cid}
mapper.update: update company set cpasswd = #{cpasswd}, cname = #{cname}, cemail = #{cemail}, cno1 = #{cno1}, cno2 = #{cno2}, cno3 = #{cno3}, cmaster = #{cmaster}, ccategory = #{ccategory}, post1 = #{post1}, post2 = #{post2}, addr1 = #{addr1}, addr2 = #{addr2}, cphone1 = #{cphone1}, cphone2 = #{cphone2}, cphone3 = #{cphone3} where cid = #{cid}
